thread.title: BRIEF-Tecnotree: Preliminary Results Of Viking Acquisition Corp's Tender Offer For All Shares In Tecnotree

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tecnotree: Preliminary Results Of Viking Acquisition Corp's Tender Offer For All Shares In Tecnotree

organizations.name: preliminary results of viking acquisition corp

text:
April 16 (Reuters) - TECNOTREE OYJ:
* PRELIMINARY RESULTS OF VIKING ACQUISITION CORPâ€™S TENDER OFFER FOR ALL THE SHARES IN TECNOTREE AND EXTENSION OF OFFER PERIOD
* ACCORDING TO PRELIM RESULTS OF TENDER OFFER, SHARES TENDERED IN TENDER OFFER REPRESENT ABOUT 59.9 % OF ALL SHARES AND VOTES IN TECNOTREE
* OFFEROR HAS ACQUIRED 23,393,197 TECNOTREE SHARES OUTSIDE TENDER OFFER REPRESENTING ABOUT 19.1 % OF ALL SHARES AND VOTES IN TECNOTREE
* SHARES TENDERED IN TENDER OFFER TOTAL ABOUT 79.0 % OF ALL SHARES AND VOTES IN TECNOTREE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
